Sentencas: A new alkali-containing diopside based glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide cells was synthesized, characterized and tested.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The composition was designed to match the coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) of Crofer22APU interconnect.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The sealant has a glass transition temperature of 600 degrees C, a crystallization peak temperature of 850 degrees C and a maximum shrinkage temperature of 700 degrees C, thus suggesting effective densification prior to crystallization.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The CTE of the glass-ceramic is 11.5 10(-6) K-1 , a value which is compatible with the CTE for Crofer22APU stainless steel.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Crofer22APU/glass-ceramic/Crofer22APU joined samples were tested in simulated real-life operating conditions at 800 degrees C in dual atmosphere under an applied voltage, monitoring the electrical resistivity.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The effect of two different applied voltages (0.7 V and 1.3 V) was evaluated.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: A voltage of 1.3 V led to a rapid decrease in the electrical resistivity during the test; such a drop was due to the formation of Cr 2 0 3 bridges that connected the two Crofer22APU plates separated by the sealant.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: There was no decrease in the resistivity when a voltage of 0.7 V was applied.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Instead, resistivity value remained stable at around 10 5 0 cm for the 100 h test duration.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The degradation mechanisms, due to both the alkali content and the applied voltage, are investigated and discussed.
Titulo: Effect of electric load and dual atmosphere on the properties of an alkali containing diopside-based glass sealant for solid oxide cells
